mapper.insert: insert into t_notice_template (ID, TEMPLATE_KEY, TITLE, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, template_status, remark, CONTENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{templateStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_notice_template set TEMPLATE_KEY = #{templateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, template_status = #{templateStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, TEMPLATE_KEY, TITLE, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, template_status, remark, CONTENT from t_notice_template where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, TEMPLATE_KEY, TITLE, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, template_status, remark, CONTENT from t_notice_template
